Text: doesnt work. when i load the campaign up the game crashes and says german truck simulator has stopped working. Any ideas????

Instructions are all wrong.
First, the win_x86 folder is as win x86 in the patch. 

Put the lang_1033.dll to the correct folder, unlike the patch.

Second, that "to my documents" mod you have to put into documents > German truck simulator, and not just copy paste so it would be Game Truck simulator or you'll have no english option at in-game options and ui would be missing icons
